product_name: Serfas True 2500 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: With a stunning 2,500-lumen output, the superbright Serfas True 2500 USB Front Bike Light turns night into day for trail and road rides, and it has a USB outlet for on-the-go charging of a smartphone. Outputs a blazing 2,500 lumens on Overdrive mode, 1,600 lumens on High, 1,000 lumens on Medium and 600 lumens on Low. 6600mAh rechargeable battery provides up to 1 hr. 45 min. of use on Overdrive, 2 hrs. 45 min. on High, 4 hrs. on Medium and 7 hrs. 30 min. on Low. Battery recharges in about 4 hrs. when plugged into the wall. Charge your smartphone, GPS or other USB-enabled device directly from the True 2500 bike light battery. Serfas True 2500 USB Front Bike Light includes a handlebar mount and a universal helmet mount. Also includes a wall charger, wired remote switch, 3 ft. extension cable, 1 ft. extension cable, manual, carry case and battery strap.
